Hello All,

I need some help. I am trying to run a crawl and it reaches 90% and then drops back again to 77% !! When i check the seeds report, the last entry is the same for the past one hour. I checked the logs and the crawler seems to be stuck with the same link. Is there any way to get out of this problem? is there a method to skip that particular link at which the crawler is getting stuck. I did try to read the documentation but am rather confused. I would highly appreciate any kind of help with issue.

thanks,
janhavi

Hello All,<br><br>I need some help. I am trying to run a crawl and it reaches 90% and then drops back again to 77% !! When i check the seeds report, the last entry is the same for the past one hour. I checked the logs and the crawler seems to be stuck with the same link. Is there any way to get out of this problem? is there a method to skip that particular link at which the crawler is getting stuck. I did try to read the documentation but am rather confused. I would highly appreciate any kind of help with issue.<br><br>thanks,<br>janhavi<br><p>
